title: actix-web v4.2.0's actix-http dependency is not specific enough
body:
# *Update: The issue has been fixed in v4.2.1, please update your actix-web version.* 

## Expected Behavior
`actix-web` v4.2.0 successfully build, as long as its transitive dependencies all satisfy the version constraints.

## Current Behavior
`actix-web` v4.2.0 doesn't build with actix-http v3.2.0 despite the actix-http version satisfies the constraint.

https://github.com/actix/actix-web/blob/7767cf30710ec2a8666b0c9e6f578aa590038a54/actix-web/Cargo.toml#L74

## Possible Solution
Change `Cargo.toml` in `actix-web` to point to `actix-http` 3.2.2+.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
Create a repo with `actix-web` pinned to `v4.2.0` and `actix-http` `v3.2.0`.
`cargo build` fails with the following.

```console
   Compiling actix-web v4.2.0
error[E0277]: the trait bound `actix_http::header::ExtendedValue: std::cmp::Eq` is not satisfied
   --> $HOME/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/actix-web-4.2.0/src/http/header/content_disposition.rs:99:17
    |
82  | #[derive(Clone, Debug, PartialEq, Eq)]
    |                                   -- in this derive macro expansion
...
99  |     FilenameExt(ExtendedValue),
    |                 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `std::cmp::Eq` is not implemented for `actix_http::header::ExtendedValue`
    |
note: required by a bound in `AssertParamIsEq`
   --> $HOME/.rustup/toolchains/stable-aarch64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/cmp.rs:317:31
    |
317 | pub struct AssertParamIsEq<T: Eq + ?Sized> {
    |                               ^^ required by this bound in `AssertParamIsEq`
    = note: this error originates in the derive macro `Eq` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info)
```

## Context
The repo has `Cargo.lock`. Dependabot bumps the actix-web, which causes the build to fail because `actix-http` is not new enough.

## Your Environment
- Rust Version (I.e, output of `rustc -V`): `rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08)`
- Actix Web Version: 4.2.0
